Subject: Ready For Battle
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He arrived at the CF, and transformed. He waited for the the Alliance.

::Dollen::

He saw Scyther and the others on the ground below.
"StarScream, set us down there."

::Demolition::

He continued to follow the Maximals. He din't care if they ended up at
the CF. With all the Alliance troops, they were sure to win.

::DrillBit::

He looked at the monitors and sensors.
"Hey Killfest, look at this swarm of Alliance troops chasing a few
Maxi's towards the Cybertronian Fire."
